abstract.t: This Internet Draft discusses Reliable UDP (RUDP). RUDP is a simplepacket based transport protocol. RUDP is based on RFCs 1151 and 908 -Reliable Data Protocol. RUDP is layered on the UDP/IP Protocols andprovides reliable in-order delivery (up to a maximum number ofretransmissions) for virtual connections. RUDP has a very flexibledesign that would make it suitable for a variety of transport uses.One such use would be to transport telecommunication signalingprotocols.
